cp_sections.title: Hematopathology for Clinical Pathology
cp_sections.note: This section is directed toward AP/CP residents. AP-only candidates (i.e., AP single certificate) are expected to focus less on Clinical Pathology components, while CP-only candidates (i.e., CP single certificate) will focus less on tissue-based diagnostics.
